title: Installation issue: rocsolver-4.2.0: unable to build in internet-access restricted environment
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue
@arjun-raj-kuppala @srekolam

rocsolver does not install in a internet-access restricted environment even though all spack-related files were previously downloaded with `spack fetch -D rocsolver`.

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install -j100 hipblas ^cmake@3.17.5 %gcc@10.3.0                                                                                                       [+] /opt/hlrs/spack/2021-06-16/pkgconf/1.7.4-gcc-10.3.0-w6uyokeh                                                                                              [+] /opt/hlrs/spack/2021-06-16/berkeley-db/18.1.40-gcc-10.3.0-ah73t52z                                                                                        [+] /opt/hlrs/spack/2021-06-16/zlib/1.2.11-gcc-10.3.0-msipemqj                                                                                                [+] /opt/hlrs/spack/2021-06-16/libsigsegv/2.13-gcc-10.3.0-j53u2sdq                                                                                            [+] /opt/hlrs/spack/2021-06-16/util-macros/1.19.1-gcc-10.3.0-belci7vc                                                                                         [+] /opt/hlrs/spack/2021-06-16/libiconv/1.16-gcc-10.3.0-cjznarn4                                                                                              [+] /opt/hlrs/spack/2021-06-16/xz/5.2.5-gcc-10.3.0-fadnkry5                                                                                                   [+] /opt/hlrs/spack/2021-06-16/libelf/0.8.13-gcc-10.3.0-camcg7ml
```
